comment.caption: Ilona Massey's Final Test
comment.note: Actress Ilona Massey (left) poses for a screen test. Original caption: Directed by Billy Grady, at her left, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer talent executive, who has groomed Ilona Massey for seventeen months to finally achieve stardom opposite Nelson Eddy in Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer's "Balalaika". The costume is one she wears in the film.
